biotools.summary: Optimizing Combinatorial Design of Pooled ELISpot Assays with an Epitope Similarity Model. ACE facilitates (1) generation of ELISpot configurations (peptide-pool assignments) using a deep learning approach to cluster similar peptides and (2) deconvolution of pool spot counts for identification of immunogenic peptides.
